original_title: Muse: Live at Rock In Rio 2013
overview: Announced in July of 2012, Muse were one of the headliners of the 2013 Rock In Rio festival, held in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Other headliners included Metallica, Beyonce, Iron Maiden and Bruce Springsteen, amongst others.  Performed on 14th September 2013.
title: Muse: Live at Rock in Rio 2013
